description:
crypto/cipher: panic on invalid IV length

Give better user feedback when invalid IV is used
to construct a cipher.

Fixes issue 3411

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go

Changes made, you should have a ICLA agreement on record
for shanemhansen@gmail.com

Thanks!
--Shane Hansen

On Fri, Oct 12, 2012 at 9:23 AM, <agl@golang.org> wrote:

> LGTM with s/iv/IV/ throughout.
>
> Have you signed the ICLA?
